A4.text: Marvel vs. Capcom: Clash of Super Heroes is a 1998 crossover fighting game developed and published by Capcom for the CP System II arcade system.

A5.text: The game was exhibited at the AOU Show in February 1998 before being released in Japanese arcades that month, followed by North America in March 1998.
